respondToPetitionPage.title: Response Form
respondToPetitionPage.intro: This is the form where you submit your official response to a petition. This response will be displayed on the original petition, so this is your opportunity to communicate with everyone who supported the initiative. Make sure your response is a good one.

hints.title: A few pointers on what makes a good response:
hints.first: Make sure to answer to the original complaint/idea.
hints.second: Outline what the next steps are.
hints.third: Remember to sign with your name and department.
hints.fourth: The citizens in your city cared enough to write and/or support a cause, be respectful of their opinions.

respondedToPetitionPage.hint: Your response will be reviewed within one working day.

hero.title: Petitio is your platform enabling local change
hero.missionDescription: Petitio is operated by AZ Medien. Our wish is to empower people to make change in their local communities. We want to give you the chance to be heard, make your cause known, and to gather supporters. We promise to follow up any successful petitions with a letter to your local representative. And, on top of that, your petition might even be selected to be covered by any of our news outlets.
